Description: Gold finger-ring; hammered; narrow flat hoop broadening into a plain convex oval bezel with no decoration.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Amathus
Bibliographic references: Finger Ring / Catalogue of the Finger Rings, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum (918)
Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (p.119, Tomb 88)
Laffineur et al. 1986 / Amathonte III. Testimonia 3. L'Orfèvrerie. Scarabées, scaraboïdes et cônes. La coupe en argent du British Museum (No. 130, pp.35, 95)
